titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post current interests rates charged for various categories of loans to consumers.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs and Coinage.

House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post, in clear and conspicuous language, current interest rates for all categories of consumer loans. Requires the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to prescribe regulations to carry out this Act.
